activities: We develop mobile apps to allow sport fans to talk to their friends, while watching a game on TV. We partner with European football clubs and leagues. Some data of their users is collected in our servers in the USA.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: email, password, facebook credentials, logs about activity in the application
recoursemech: commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives and JAMS
